Name: Prague Czech-English Dependency Treebank 2.0 Coref
Description: This corpus is an extended version of Prague Czech-English Dependency Treebank 2.0, with added mark-up of coreference. The syntactic parsing follows the PDT 2.0 style. The corpus is available for download from the LINDAT repository. The version without coreference annotation is available through the concordancer KonText and the PML-TQ tool (Czech part only).
